testcase.classname: the user should be able to register successfully
testcase.name: user register with valid data
testcase.system-out: Given user navigates to register page.......................................passed When user fill the required fields with valid data..........................passed And user click on register button...........................................passed Then user could register successfully.......................................passed

testcase.classname: the user should be able to login successfully
testcase.name: user login with valid username and password
testcase.system-out: Given user navigates to login page..........................................passed When user enter valid email.................................................passed And user enter valid password...............................................passed And user click on login button..............................................passed Then user could login successfully..........................................passed

testcase.classname: User could reset his/her password successfully
testcase.name: user could reset password successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user navigates to login page..........................................passed When user click on forget password link.....................................passed And user enter valid email..................................................passed And user click on recover button............................................passed Then user receive an email to reset password successfully...................passed

testcase.name: Create successful Order
